[WebHostMob.com](http://webhostmob.com) is a Lower Cost Exchange Email Service Provider. Prices start at $1.00/mo/user for LET Only! 

We are Running a Special to Launch our Exchange Email Services! This is a one time Promotion! Only available on LET! Give us a Try If you do not like our Service we will give you a Refund within 30 Days. 


Our Features:

Unlimited Domain (Alias)

Priced Per user

25 to 100 GB Storage (More Upon Request For Additional Charge)

TLS/SSL for secure access & transmission 

Auto Detect Support 

Outlook Web Access 

Free setup & migration 

Webmail w/ 50 MB attachments 

IMAP, SMTP, POP3, Active Sync support 

Anti-spam & anti-virus protection

DDoS protection 

24/7 Direct-Admin support
